sentences.en: A decision will be taken at the culmination of the initial research.
sentences.cn: 在初始阶段研究结束时将作出决议.

sentences.en: In your relationships, something is coming culmination on the moon, October 14.
sentences.cn: 在你的人际关系方面, 有些事会在10月14号满月的时候达到最高点.

sentences.en: It may truly be regarded as the culmination of classical Greek geometry.
sentences.cn: 这确实可以看成是古典希腊几何的登峰造级之作.

sentences.en: The conclusions and implications are the culmination of the situation analysis and the planning session.
sentences.cn: 结论和影响是经过对形势的分析和规划会议.

sentences.en: The contaminated vital vitamin made racial discrimination come to culmination.
sentences.cn: 被污染的主要维他命使种族轻视到达极点.

sentences.en: The culmination of the doctor's life's work was his discovery of a cure of cancer.
sentences.cn: 这位医生毕生事业的最大成就就是发现了癌症疗法.

sentences.en: The culmination of the work on singularities is two famous transformation theorems.
sentences.cn: 奇点研究的顶峰是两个著名的变换定理.

sentences.en: The feeling of being loved is the culmination of infinite happiness.
sentences.cn: 被爱的感觉就是幸福无限的顶点.

sentences.en: The highest point of a trap is the crest, or culmination.
sentences.cn: 含有烃类的那部分圈闭的最低点称为溢出点.

sentences.en: The show marked the culmination of months of hard work.
sentences.cn: 这场演出标志着几个月艰辛工作的最终成果.

sentences.en: The spectre of eugenics, which reached its culmination in Nazi Germany, haunts both politicians and public.
sentences.cn: 优生学的幽灵的特性, 它在纳粹德国达到了它的顶点, 它在政客和公众那都挥之不去.

sentences.en: Their arrest was the culmination of an operation in which 120 other people were detained.
sentences.cn: 他们的被捕标志着一场另有120人被拘留的行动的结束。

sentences.en: Their divorce is the culmination of years of bitter fights and wrangling.
sentences.cn: 他们经过多年的争执和口角,终于离婚了.

sentences.en: This is very possibly the culmination of all Michaels'works.
sentences.cn: 这是很可能所有迈克尔的作品中最出色的一首.

sentences.en: This little book represented the culmination of 15 years’ work.
sentences.cn: 这本小书是15年工作的结晶。

sentences.en: This massive autobiographical work was the logical culmination of her long career.
sentences.cn: 这部自传体的宏篇巨制是她漫长事业生涯的必然成果.

words.tran_cn: 到绝顶；达到高潮；达到顶点

trans.tran_en: something, especially something important, that happens at the end of a long period of effort or development
